title: Eat for health
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Hal Kopel
brief_description: This film introduces a new approach in teaching children to eat a well balanced diet. Using the five fingers of his hand as an always available check-off device, Ralph learns to eat a balanced diet of bread and butter or margarine; milk and cheese; meat and eggs; vegetables and fruits
